name: The Infirmity
description:
The Infirmity is a third-person zombie shooter game about different stories during the zombie epidemic.

The Infirmity Main Story

The story begins when Dr. Kylie, a successful scientist, discovered a technology called GMET (Genetic Modeling and Editing Technology). By means of this technology, the genetic map of living things is completely known to easily make changes in the DNA. This can be used to produce more efficient animals and to treat some diseases. When this technology was introduced, it attracted great interest and received high investments. And in a short time, a company called GMET Center was established and experiments with GMET began.
Having achieved successful results on other living creatures, GMET's next experiment will be on the Bombyx Mori insect. However, things do not go as before and serious problems begin to occur. Things are getting out of control and dangerous.
This danger has now surrounded not only GMET but all humanity...

Gameplay

We are currently offering a single player mission. In this mission, you complete the mission by killing zombies with different weapons, getting rid of zombie waves and also overcoming various obstacles.
